channel.title: Making dragon bolts stackable help me plz
channel.description: :D i need someone to tell me how i make a item stackable cause its not atm.

item.title: Making dragon bolts stackable help me plz
item.dc:creator: @runescapeddsk0 runescapeddsk0
item.description:
@runescapeddsk0 wrote:

-.- i dont understand im stupid lol[br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2007, 08:36:59 PM[/size][hr][quote=“openice123, post:8, topic:152322”]lol you can edit stackable.dat in item.java search for
data/stackable.dat

and replace with this be sure to edit and this is server side

FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File("data/stackable.dat")); while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) { if (c == 0) itemStackable[counter] = false; else itemStackable[counter] = true; counter++; } itemStackable[dbolts id here] = true; dataIn.close(); } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace:"); e.printStackTrace(); }[/quote]w00t tyvm i got it!@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@omfg yay my rune c bow is 100% rs ;p[br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2007, 08:57:41 PM[/size][hr]o one more thing u got the emote id for rune x bows? so it can do real emote i got it working on karils xbows atm…

Read full topic
item.source: Making dragon bolts stackable help me plz

item.title: Making dragon bolts stackable help me plz
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

lol you can edit stackable.dat in item.java search for
data/stackable.dat

and replace with this be sure to edit and this is server side

FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File("data/stackable.dat")); while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) { if (c == 0) itemStackable[counter] = false; else itemStackable[counter] = true; counter++; } itemStackable[dbolts id here] = true; dataIn.close(); } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace:"); e.printStackTrace(); }

Read full topic
